name: Pulled Chicken Pretzel Sliders
author: sandra92083
summary: All the fantastic flavors of a pulled chicken sandwich atop Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps® makes for the perfect bite-size snack.
ingredients: 12 (7.2 ounce) packages Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
6 tablespoons shredded chicken in BBQ sauce, warmed
2 ounces white Cheddar cheese, cut into 12 small squares
2 thick bacon slices cooked thick bacon strips, cut into 12 pieces
directions: Top with 1/2 tablespoon heated shredded BBQ chicken, a piece of cheese, and bacon
Allow cheese to melt slightly before serving
